p.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent the Section 117 eligibility options.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Section117EligOptionsSnCT subset with subset original id 29951000000135.
The use of this subset is Advisory.

For further information on the use of SNOMED CT subsets in messaging please refer to the “Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains” document located under the Associated Specifications tab.
